data.title: Ross Haffey - Baseball
data.meta_description:
Ross Haffey (36) INF  - 2018 | Game-by-Game
Named First-Team All-MAC … Played and started in 53 games at first base … third on RedHawks with .315 batting average

Biography

2018 | Game-by-Game

Named First-Team All-MAC … Played and started in 53 games at first base … third on RedHawks with .315 batting average … led team with 15 home runs and 50 runs scored, while was second with 43 RBIs … second on Miami with 14 doubles on season … led Miami with .650 slugging percentage and .450 on base-percentage after drawing a team-high 46 walks … set new career marks with three home runs in going 4-for-4 with seven RBIS and five runs scored in win over Ball State (4/13) … followed up in second game of that doubleheader by going 3-for-5 with two more home runs, five RBIs and three runs scored … had multiple hits in 16 games during season.

2017 | Game-by-Game

Played and started in all 56 games at first base for the Red & White ... hit a team-high .338 ... also led the team in runs scored (35), runs batted in (39), home runs (13), total bases (129), slugging percentage (.581), on-base percentage (.422), multi-hit games (22) and multi-RBI games (11) ... racked up a season-high four hits in the season finale against Northern Illinois (5/20) ... tabbed a Second-Team All-MAC performer.

2016 | Game-by-Game

Started at first base in all 56 gamesled the team in numerous categories, including batting average (.355), on-base percentage (.439), hits (77), RBIs (48), runs (29) and doubles (20) … recorded 23 multi-hit games and nine multi-RBI games … compiled a 19-game hitting streak during the season … notched four hits and six RBIs at Belmont (2/27) … received Second-Team All-MAC honors.

2014

Did not appear in any games (redshirted).

HIGH SCHOOL

Lettered twice each in baseball and hockey ... helped baseball team finish state runner-up as a senior ... as a junior, he helped his hockey team win a state championship ... baseball team posted a combined 65-17 record over his junior and senior seasons ... member of the National Honor Society.

PERSONAL

Full name is Ross Michael Haffey ... born March 8, 1995 in Royal Oak, Mich. ... parents are Cheryl and Colin Haffey ... seventh member of his family to attend Miami, including the fourth student-athlete ... majoring in - Economics.
